# IDE and Editor Directories

This repository contains various IDE/editor-specific directories that are locally generated and should not be committed to git.

## Currently Present (Auto-Generated)

### AI Assistant Directories
- `.agent/` - Kimi CLI agent workspace
- `.antigravity/` - Gemini/Claude integration
- `.arifos_clip/` - Clipboard artifacts
- `.claude/` - Claude Desktop integration
- `.codex/` - GitHub Copilot workspace
- `.cursor/` - Cursor IDE configuration
- `.gemini-clipboard/` - Gemini clipboard cache
- `.kimi/` - Kimi CLI configuration
- `.openmcp/` - OpenMCP server configs
- `.serena/` - Serena IDE workspace

### Development Tools
- `.vs/` - Visual Studio configuration
- `.vscode/` - VS Code configuration
- `.pytest_cache/` - pytest cache (deleted during cleanup)

## Gitignore Status

Most of these directories are properly ignored via `.gitignore`:
- `.vs/`, `.claude/` (partial), `.gemini/`, `nul` - explicitly ignored
- `.pytest_cache/` - covered by generic patterns
- Others should be added if they start tracking files

## Cleanup Safety

These directories are SAFE TO DELETE locally as they are regenerated by your development tools:
```bash
# All IDE directories are non-essential cache/config
.agent/
.antigravity/
.arifos_clip/
.claude/
.codex/
.cursor/
.gemini-clipboard/
.kimi/
.openmcp/
.serena/
.vs/
.vscode/
.pytest_cache/
```

**DO NOT DELETE** `.git/`, `arifos.egg-info/`, or `VAULT999/` - these are essential.

## Architecture Note

The presence of multiple AI assistant directories reflects the constitutional AI development approach using multiple orthogonal agents (Claude, Gemini, Copilot, Kimi) to verify and validate changes.
